title: Watch: Sharman-Zarine's steamy romance in 'Tumhe Apna Banane Ki Kasam'
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 21, 2015, 15.40 pm Mumbai: The hit song 'Tumhe Apna Banane Ki Kasam', which was originally used in Sadak (1991), has been recreated by the young talented music composer Amaal Mallik and sung by Armaan Malik and Neeti Mohan for 'Hate Story 3'. While the original song featuring Sanjay Dutt and Pooja Bhatt was full of innocence and pure love, this new version is all about sheer, hot, blush-inducing, temperature-raising love making scenes. Sharman Joshi and Zarine Khan's chemistry is both tender and incredibly erotic. There is love, but also a whole heckuva bunch of lust. Without divulging any more details, go ahead and watch the number here.
